Description:
Engage students to ensure a lively classroom atmosphere.
Curate lesson structures that include appropriate pacing to complete the contents of the lesson within the assigned duration.
Instigate student engagement to enable a dynamic atmosphere in the classroom.
Cultivate a vibrant ambience in the classroom by fostering student participation.Skills
Skills:
The ability to compile lesson plans efficiently.
Infusing each lesson with a dash of innovation to maintain the students' interest.
Well-versed in handling various tasks on the computer and comfortable with verbal and written communication.
Two bachelor degrees - one in English and a specialized degree in education.
